verses.text:
\w Then|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H3212"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*, show love \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* woman, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* loved \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w commits|strong="H5003"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*. Love \w her|strong="H3212"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* loves \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, though \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w other|strong="H5750"\w* gods, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* love \w the|strong="H3068"\w* raisin cakes offered \w to|strong="H3478"\w* idols.

So I redeemed her \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H2563"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w homer|strong="H2563"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lethek \w of|strong="H2563"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* told \w her|strong="H1571"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w must|strong="H1571"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w must|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* sleep around \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w marry|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H1571"\w*. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* do \w the|strong="H3117"\w* same \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w prince|strong="H8269"\w*, \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w pillar|strong="H4676"\w*, \w without|strong="H3427"\w* ephod \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w teraphim|strong="H8655"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* afterward \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* Davidic \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w awe|strong="H6342"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w*.
